titles.title: Equal Justice for United States Military Personnel Act of 2009
A bill to allow for certiorari review of certain cases denied relief or review by the United States Court of Appeals for the Armed Forces.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1125)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/30/2009--Introduced.
Equal Justice for United States Military Personnel Act of 2009 - Amends the federal judicial code to allow for review by writ of certiorari of certain cases denied relief or review by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Armed Forces.
